Articles.Content:
Hi!

I've been playing KSP for about a couple of months now. But new to the forums.

Still, I'm still having trouble with some 'Orbital Maneuvers' as we formally call it.

But let's talk about myself first...

Part 1: PC

let's talk about my... I mean our crappy PC first. Although I'm not 'riley' expert at PCs. I'm just a 13 yer ol' sort of nerdy kid on Philippines.

Well, 13 year old kids in here doesn't have knowledge of that. More than 15 yea ol's does.

Ok, back to 'our crappy pc (sort of)'

I'm currently using my dad's laptop, (Windows 8, Touch Screen, 1920x1080p) this is not the PC yet. I just use this for high speed internet.

Our Pc has a monitor of 1600x900p res., Dual-Core CPU, and an Nvidia Video Card that only supports SM2 Shaders.

This is our Grandfather PC, more than 4 years old, 2 repairs. 2 parts replaced, Motherboard and Videocard. (When my older brother emptied the Videocard's memory, which results in Blue Screen Errors, and Videocard Memory Errors. Really Annoying.)

The first repair, after (sort of) maybe I broke the computer after Sims3 errored when I made a house full of doors.

And now, soon dad will buy a new Videocard that SUPPORTS 3SM SHADERS!!! and he said something about a microprocessor. Is there a triocore?

"And that's the end of that."

Part 2: Knowledge

This part refers about at the knowledge on KSP. Like Orbiting, making crappy rockets.(Oh sorry, that's not a knowledge...)

In the first days of KSP, of course I didn't know what to do, so I just loaded some Stock Rockets, aaaaand launch it. Tapping space endlessly was fun!

Soon I first made a rocket. (I didn't knew what was staging.) I make stagings out of Action Groups... Hehe. And of course, the rocket didn't get really far.

This is my 1st post. 1ST POST, so I honestly don't what more I can add here. So I'll just make some Timeline.

Srry About teh crappy post. HEHE

Versions Time Things made Mods Added

0.21 about a month crappy things None

0.22 4 months learned to orbit and things FS, CSS, FASA, etc.

0.23 3 months had fun with other mods FS, SP+, AIES, etc.

Please give me some other advices. THANKS!!!

Srry again for my crappy post.
Hello Eoal123. Welcome to the game, and to the forum.

Welcome Eoal! Here's a post which'll give you some new ideas.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/58260-Tips-and-tricks-you-found-out-yourself.
Thanks! Srry for the late reply though. Internet was slow and lazy.
